channel.title: How To Add 4 Hit Claws To Your Server

item.title: How To Add 4 Hit Claws To Your Server
item.dc:creator: @DemisePking DemisePking
item.description:
@DemisePking wrote:

So many people ask this on help, client help, and pretty much every forum area on this entire website. This tutorial is assuming that you do not have d claws ids in your server already.

I take no credit for the claw model and ints, nor the 4 hit claw special code. this is 100% just here to help those dam nubs that spam the help section :\

-Adding The Claw Model And Ints-
Add this in your class8.java

Code:
[sup]if(3095) // Replace it with your own Dragon claws ID
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wield”;
class8.anInt174 = 13698; // inv model
class8.anInt181 = 738;
class8.anInt190 = 245;
class8.anInt198 = 80;
class8.anInt169 = -2; // model offset; increase to move to the right
class8.anInt194 = 3; // model offset; increase to move up
class8.anInt165 = 13699; // male model
class8.anInt200 = 13699; // female model
class8.anInt188 = -1;
class8.anInt164 = -1;
class8.aString170 = “Dragon claws”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “A set of fighting claws.”.getBytes();
}[/sup]

13699 model: http://www.mediafire.com/?nddonk4ltiu
13698 model: http://www.mediafire.com/?mmyiekyyzjg

This wont work if you dont type add model 13698 and 13699 in game

-The Actual Special Code-

Search for where your specials are placed in client.java (server sided) and put this code somewhere there. If your having trouble finding the specials and stuff try searching for “specialamount”.

Then add this code below one of the specials already there

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3095 && specialAmount > 49){
startAnimation(2068);
int firstHit;
int secondHit;
int thirdHit;
int fourthHit;
firstHit = hitDiff;
secondHit = firstHit/2;
thirdHit = secondHit/2;
fourthHit = secondHit/2;
if (secondHit % 2 != 0) {
fourthHit++;
}
usingSpecial = true;
specialAmount -= 50;
specOn = false;
}

That should work. if it doesnt then leave a comment below or pm me :\

Read full topic
item.source: How To Add 4 Hit Claws To Your Server
